verses.verse: Boasting <S%G2744><s%> is necessary, <S%G1163><s%> though <S%G3303><s%> it is not profitable; <S%G4851><s%> but I will go <S%G2064><s%> on to visions <S%G3701><s%> and revelations <S%G602><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

I know <S%G3609><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> who fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> ago <S%G4253><s%> – whether <S%G1535><s%> in the body <S%G4983><s%> I do not know, <S%G3609><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> out of the body <S%G4983><s%> I do not know, <S%G3609><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> – such <S%G5108><s%> a man <S%G5108><s%> was caught <S%G726><s%> up to the third <S%G5154><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And I know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> – whether <S%G1535><s%> in the body <S%G4983><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the body <S%G4983><s%> I do not know, <S%G3609><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> –

was caught <S%G726><s%> up into Paradise, <S%G3857><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> inexpressible <S%G731><s%> words, <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is not permitted <S%G1832><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

On behalf <S%G5228><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> a man <S%G5108><s%> will I boast; <S%G2744><s%> but on my own <S%G1683><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%> I will not boast, <S%G2744><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> in regard to [my] weaknesses. <S%G769><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> I do wish <S%G2309><s%> to boast <S%G2744><s%> I shall not be foolish, <S%G878><s%> for I shall be speaking <S%G3004><s%> the truth; <S%G225><s%> but I refrain <S%G5339><s%> [from this,] so <S%G3361><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> may credit <S%G3049><s%> me with more <S%G5228><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> he sees <S%G991><s%> [in] me or <S%G2228><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> from me.

And because of the surpassing <S%G5236><s%> greatness <S%G5236><s%> of the revelations, <S%G602><s%> for this <S%G1352><s%> reason, <S%G1352><s%> to keep <S%G3361><s%> me from exalting <S%G5229><s%> myself, there was given <S%G1325><s%> me a thorn <S%G4647><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> a messenger <S%G32><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%> to buffet <S%G2852><s%> me – to keep <S%G3361><s%> me from exalting <S%G5229><s%> myself!
Concerning <S%G5228><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> I entreated <S%G3870><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> three <S%G5151><s%> times <S%G5151><s%> that it might depart <S%G868><s%> from me.

And He has said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "My grace <S%G5485><s%> is sufficient <S%G714><s%> for you, for power <S%G1411><s%> is perfected <S%G5055><s%> in weakness <S%G769><s%>." Most <S%G2234><s%> gladly, <S%G2234><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> I will rather <S%G3123><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> about <S%G1722><s%> my weaknesses, <S%G769><s%> that the power <S%G1411><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G1981><s%> in me.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I am <S%G2106><s%> well <S%G2106><s%> content <S%G2106><s%> with weaknesses, <S%G769><s%> with insults, <S%G5196><s%> with distresses, <S%G318><s%> with persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> with difficulties, <S%G4730><s%> for Christ's sake; <S%G5228><s%> for when <S%G3752><s%> I am <S%G770><s%> weak, <S%G770><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> strong. <S%G1415><s%>

I have become <S%G1096><s%> foolish; <S%G878><s%> you yourselves <S%G4771><s%> compelled <S%G315><s%> me. Actually <S%G1063><s%> I should <S%G3784><s%> have been commended <S%G4921><s%> by you, for in no <S%G3762><s%> respect <S%G3762><s%> was I inferior <S%G5302><s%> to the most <S%G5244><s%> eminent <S%G5244><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> a nobody. <S%G3762><s%>

The signs <S%G4592><s%> of a true apostle <S%G652><s%> were performed <S%G2716><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you with all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance, <S%G5281><s%> by signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders <S%G5059><s%> and miracles. <S%G1411><s%>

For in what <S%G5101><s%> respect were you treated <S%G2274><s%> as inferior <S%G2274><s%> to the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the churches, <S%G1577><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> that I myself <S%G846><s%> did not become a burden <S%G2655><s%> to you? Forgive <S%G5483><s%> me this <S%G3778><s%> wrong! <S%G93><s%>

Here <S%G2400><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> time <S%G5154><s%> I am <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you, and I will not be a burden <S%G2655><s%> to you; for I do not seek <S%G2212><s%> what is yours, <S%G4771><s%> but you; for children <S%G5043><s%> are not responsible <S%G3784><s%> to save <S%G2343><s%> up for [their] parents, <S%G1118><s%> but parents <S%G1118><s%> for [their] children. <S%G5043><s%>

And I will most <S%G2234><s%> gladly <S%G2234><s%> spend <S%G1159><s%> and be expended <S%G1550><s%> for your souls. <S%G5590><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you the more, <S%G4057><s%> am I to be loved <S%G25><s%> the less <S%G7090><s%>?
But be that as it may, I did not burden <S%G2599><s%> you myself; <S%G1473><s%> nevertheless, <S%G235><s%> crafty <S%G3835><s%> fellow that I am, I took <S%G2983><s%> you in by deceit. <S%G1388><s%>
[Certainly] I have not taken <S%G4122><s%> advantage <S%G4122><s%> of you through <S%G1223><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of those whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G649><s%> to you, have I?

I urged <S%G3870><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> [to go,] and sent <S%G4882><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> with him. Titus <S%G5103><s%> did not take <S%G4122><s%> any <S%G4122><s%> advantage <S%G4122><s%> of you, did he? Did we not conduct <S%G4043><s%> ourselves <S%G4043><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> [and walk] in the same <S%G846><s%> steps <S%G2487><s%>?

All <S%G3819><s%> this <S%G3819><s%> time <S%G3819><s%> you have been thinking <S%G1380><s%> that we are defending <S%G626><s%> ourselves to you. [Actually,] it is in the sight <S%G2713><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> that we have been speaking <S%G2980><s%> in Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> for your upbuilding, <S%G3619><s%> beloved. <S%G27><s%>

For I am <S%G5399><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> that perhaps <S%G4458><s%> when I come <S%G2064><s%> I may find <S%G2147><s%> you to be not what <S%G3634><s%> I wish <S%G2309><s%> and may be found <S%G2147><s%> by you to be not what <S%G3634><s%> you wish; <S%G2309><s%> that perhaps <S%G4458><s%> [there may be] strife, <S%G2054><s%> jealousy, <S%G2205><s%> angry <S%G2372><s%> tempers, <S%G2372><s%> disputes, <S%G2052><s%> slanders, <S%G2636><s%> gossip, <S%G5587><s%> arrogance, <S%G5450><s%> disturbances; <S%G181><s%>

I am afraid that when I come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> may humiliate <S%G5013><s%> me before <S%G4314><s%> you, and I may mourn <S%G3996><s%> over many <S%G4183><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who have sinned <S%G4258><s%> in the past <S%G4258><s%> and not repented <S%G3340><s%> of the impurity, <S%G167><s%> immorality <S%G4202><s%> and sensuality <S%G766><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have practiced. <S%G4238><s%>
